section.p: The Cave of Bells is, in fact, a cathedral of great size. Inside its cavernous interior hang dozens of huge bronze bells. All the bells are etched with Shadar Runes; they have names such as The Thunderer, Knell of Doom, Ringer-in-Darkness and so on.
